locations.name: Stream
locations.detailedDescription: The stream is crystal clear. You can see fish swimming.

locations.name: Campsite
locations.detailedDescription: The campfire has been long abandoned, the ashes cold.

locations.name: Forest
locations.description: You are surrounded by towering trees.
locations.detailedDescription: The trees are so tall they block out most of the sunlight.

locations.name: Cave
locations.detailedDescription: You see faint flickering lights deep inside the cave.
